snippet.title: Fracas teaser trailer
snippet.description:
A peaceful temple is attacked by security forces. A military laboratory is invaded by terrorists. Everyone is looking for Hieman, a man with a mysterious illness and dangerous connections. 

Fracas is an upcoming dungeon crawler that evokes a retro RPG experience and a complex story. It aims to keep you intrigued as you unravel the mystery behind this enigmatic character who has society on the brink of collapse.
